ModMetaData.name: No Research
ModMetaData.author: James Pham
ModMetaData.description: Starting a new game without any research. - New Ancient Tribe: Basically 'New Tribe' without any research. - New Jungle Mans: 'New Tribe' without any research, plus Medieval starting tech level. - New Abandoned Arrivals: Basically 'New Arrivals' without any research.
